meanings.sent1: The sponge is compressible and can be squished easily.
meanings.sent2: The foam mattress is compressible, allowing it to be rolled up for storage.
meanings.sent3: The compressible pillow became a favorite among travelers for its space-saving feature.
meanings.sent4: Her compressible backpack seemed to shrink as she packed more items into it.
meanings.sent5: The compressible material of the jacket made it perfect for fitting into small bags.

meanings.definition: Able to be reduced in size or volume by pressure.
meanings.sent1: The compressible tube collapsed easily when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: The air mattress is compressible, making it convenient for camping trips.
meanings.sent3: The compressible packaging saved a lot of space in the moving truck.
meanings.sent4: His compressible water bottle shrunk down to a tiny size when empty.
meanings.sent5: The compressible fabric of the tent allowed it to be packed tightly into its bag.

meanings.definition: Able to be squeezed or compacted.
meanings.sent1: The compressible clay could be molded into various shapes.
meanings.sent2: The compressible trash bags easily fit into the small bin.
meanings.sent3: The compressible dough made it simple to create different pastry designs.
meanings.sent4: The compressible foam expanded back to its original shape after being squeezed.
meanings.sent5: The compressible material of the stress ball returned to its form after being squished.
